quotes.message: As negative thoughts produce negative actions, so positive thoughts produce positive actions.
quotes.name: John C. Maxwell

quotes.message: Negative thoughts are the nails that build a prison of failure.
quotes.name: Jon Gordon

quotes.message: Believing in negative thoughts is the single greatest obstruction to success.
quotes.name: Charles F. Glassman

quotes.message: The best way to dispel negative thoughts is to require that they have a purpose.
quotes.name: Robert Breault

quotes.message: The best way to overcome undesirable or negative thoughts and feelings is to cultivate the positive ones.
quotes.name: William Walker Atkinson

quotes.message: Do not allow negative thoughts to enter your mind for they are the weeds that strange confidence.
quotes.name: Bruce Lee

quotes.message: Do not let your negative thoughts have power over you because those thoughts will end up controlling your life. No one can live a positive life with a negative mind.
quotes.name: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.message: If you realized how powerful your thoughts are, you would never think a negative thought.
quotes.name: Peace Pilgrim

quotes.message: There are more blessings in the book of your destiny than your negative thoughts and beliefs are suggesting.
quotes.name: Edmond Mbiaka

quotes.message: A mind filled with negative thoughts makes you feel miserable and inadequate and will lead to failure after failure no matter how hard you try to succeed.
quotes.name: Steve Backley

quotes.message: Consider that not only do negative thoughts and emotions destroy our experience of peace, they also undermine our health.
quotes.name: Dalai Lama

quotes.message: Are you a hoarder of more negative thoughts or positive ones? Whichever ones you hoard, grow into trees and then forests.
quotes.name: John Assaraf

quotes.message: When you have walked through the hell of your negative thoughts and survived, no pain on this earth will ever again worry you.
quotes.name: Leon Brown

quotes.message: When you start comparing yourself to another man's mirror, that's when those negative thoughts start creeping in. My journey isn't anybody else's journey.
quotes.name: Arian Foster

quotes.message: When you close the door of your mind to negative thoughts, the door of opportunity opens to you.
quotes.name: Napoleon Hill

quotes.message: The only thing that can possibly keep you from going after your dreams is the person standing in your shoes, wearing your clothes, and thinking your negative thoughts.
quotes.name: Les Brown

quotes.message: The ancestor of every destructive action, every destructive decision, is a negative thought.
quotes.name: Eknath Easwaran

quotes.message: Dwelling on negative thoughts is like fertilizing weeds.
quotes.name: Norman Vincent Peale

quotes.message: Never waste energy on worries or negative thoughts, all problems are brought into existence -drop them.
quotes.name: Bruce Lee

quotes.message: Never think negatively, for the negative thinker does a very dangerous thing. He pumps out negative thoughts into the world around him and thus activates the world negatively.
quotes.name: Norman Vincent Peale

quotes.message: It was thinking negative thoughts or thinking positive thoughts, leaving the house prepared or leaving the house unprepared that made the difference.
quotes.name: Jack Canfield

quotes.message: We can lift ourselves, and others as well, when we refuse to remain in the realm of negative thought and cultivate within our hearts an attitude of gratitude.
quotes.name: Thomas S. Monson

quotes.message: Once you replace negative thoughts with positive ones, you'll start having positive results.
quotes.name: Willie Nelson

quotes.message: Be a force of love as often as you can and turn away negative thoughts whenever you feel them surface.
quotes.name: Wayne Dyer

quotes.message: Be vigilant; guard your mind against negative thoughts
quotes.name: Gautama Buddha

quotes.message: Learn to forgive others so that you can release yourself from being held captive by the very negative thoughts around you.
quotes.name: Stephen Richards

quotes.message: Just the simple process of letting go of negative thoughts will allow your natural state of health to emerge within you.
quotes.name: Rhonda Byrne

quotes.message: When your own mind tells you to quit, you must ignore your negative thoughts and press on.
quotes.name: Robert Kiyosaki

quotes.message: The way to overcome negative thoughts and destructive emotions is to develop opposing, positive emotions that are stronger and more powerful.
quotes.name: Dalai Lama

quotes.message: If you think of thoughts of success and back them up with hard work, then you will be a winner. If you cherish doubts, negative thoughts, then you won't be a winner at all.
quotes.name: Frederick Lenz

quotes.message: Positive minds produce positive lives. Negative minds produce negative lives. Positive thoughts are always full of faith and hope. Negative thoughts are always full of fear and doubt.
quotes.name: Joyce Meyer
